title: Today I saw an interesting tactic (platinum edition)
body:
Early game, no items

RED TEAM  = (JGL) {{champion:33}}  in pixel bush (MID) {{champion:142}}  in a 1v2 midlane
BLUE TEAM = (JGL) {{champion:154}}  (MID) {{champion:246}} 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

{{champion:142}} picks up a {{item:3152}}  + a free {{summoner:14}} on the floor near {{champion:246}}
{{champion:33}} pings coming to gank mid : he's in pixel bush top side
-------------------------------------
{{champion:142}} see's {{champion:154}} jump incoming, moves out of the way. (almost shit's herself)
{{champion:142}} is in a 1v2, get's {{champion:154}} passive to proc and {{champion:246}} down super low hp.
{{champion:142}} pings for rammus help.
where's rammus

{{champion:33}} "you used q, im not ganking that s(poop)"
{{champion:142}}... dies
{{champion:142}} "bruh..."
{{champion:33}} comes mid after running up and down top river kills zac, then runs down other lanes.

ggwp
